attributes.action: Change Speeding Penalties to Reduce Speeding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current systemis flawed in that you can be caught 4 times with no increase in penalty to the errant motorist before a ban comes into place, to ensure drivers learn from there poor driving i suggest changing the system to a £100 fine for the first ofence with a 3 months ban , this would be doubled with any subsequent offence, ie 2nd offence £200 and 6 months ban, 3rd offence £400 and 12 months ban, 4th offence £800 fine and 24 months ban and on and on, i believe this type of punishment would deter all speeders who put the lives of others at risk.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/speed-tax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
